pageContext.claim: “And we have a tremendous deficit. People say, "Well, there's really not that much of a deficit." Well, they're not including two things: energy and timber. And those are the two big things when it comes to Canada.”
pageContext.analysis: The U.S. had an $8.4 billion trade surplus with Canada in 2017, according to the Office of the U.S. Trade Representative. That's for goods and services in all industries, including energy and timber.
